alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:02AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM CDT... At 301 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chisholm, to near Pengilly, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hibbing and Chisholm around 305 AM CDT. Buhl around 320 AM CDT. Mountain Iron around 330 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Leetonia, Swan Lake, Kinney and Kelly Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
